title: c
description: A request by an organization (buyer) to  another ogranization (seller) to determine Serviceability at a specific location. This schema should used for CREATE and UPDATE operations.

objectType.description: The type of the object, serviceabilityRequest-create-update.

buyerId.description: A Party Role played by an Individual or an Organization that buys products and services from a Seller. Specifically, the ID of the Service Provider (Buyer) organization placing the serviceability request.

sellerId.description: An organization that provides products and services to a buyer. Specifically, the ID of the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) organization receiving the serviceability request.

projectId.description: An identifier that is used to group Orders that represent a unit of functionality that is important to a Buyer. A Project can be used to relate multiple Orders together.

pricingMethod.description: The pricing authority to be used to price the service details on this serviceability request. Choice of Tariff, Contract, Individual Case Basis (ICB), Other.

pricingReference.description: The value associated with the Pricing Method selected (e.g. a contract or tariff id).

serviceSite.description: The service site information for the serviceability request.

primarySiteContact.description: The primary site contact for the serviceability request.

alternateSiteContact.description: The secondary site contact for the serviceability request.

desiredResponseDate.description: The desired date for a response to the serviceability request formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

serviceDetail.description: Details of the service capabilities being requested.
